text: Anata gata no naka (omoni) mesa rete tsuma o nokosu mono wa, oitate rareru koto naku 1-nenkan fuyō o ukeru yō, tsuma-tachi no tame ni yuigon shinakereba naranai. Daga kano on'na-ra ga dete iki gōhō-teki ni kōdō suru koto ni taishite wa, anata gata ni tsumi wanai. Arrā wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru
